name: Every Summer Holiday - BL (Boys Love) Visual Novel
name_original: Every Summer Holiday - BL (Boys Love) Visual Novel
description:
SUMMARY

A slice of life boys love visual novel about experiencing childhood, adolescence, and adulthood.
While visiting a small town during the summer holiday, Henry meets two older boys named Jason and Eddie. The three hang out daily, and Henry starts seeing them as his older brothers. Henry has to say goodbye to his friends when the holiday ends, but they will reunite another summer.

Love Interests
Eddie and Jason are the only two love interests. Eddie acts as the smart and gentle older brother and Jason acts as the cool and playful older brother. They treat Henry as their little brother at first, but as they grow older, they might see him in a more romantic way.
Whether you want a friendship ending, a romance ending, a poly ending, or a breakup ending, anything is possible.

Childhood



Adolescence



Adulthood



Meet the Townsfolk
Talk to the townsfolk and see their events! If you see 9 of their events and max out their friendship, something might happen.



Points
Affection will increase by choosing the right choices. Bond will increase by spending time with the townsfolk.



Hangout Event
Seeing limited hangout events will strengthen your relationships!



Shop
You can give gifts to increase affection. Each item has a different function.



Explore the Town
Every day, you will get an opportunity to visit the townsfolk.



Stats
Raise stats in order to improve your chances of spending time with the Love Interests.



FEATURES

- 63K Words (Around 5 Hours Playtime)
- 24 CGs
- 5 Friendship Routes (9 Hangout Events Each)
- 2 Love Interests (Includes Neutral Ending, Romance Ending, Poly Ending, and Breakup Ending)
